scripts.build-protobuf:
mkdir -p src/generated && npx protoc-gen-grpc-ts --ts_out=service=true:src/generated --proto_path=src src/markets.proto && npx protoc-gen-grpc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:src/generated --grpc_out=src/generated --proto_path=src src/markets.proto && find src/generated/ -type f | xargs -n1 -I{} sh -c '(echo "/* tslint:disable */
" && cat {}) > /tmp/tmp-file-836636328 && mv /tmp/tmp-file-836636328 {}'
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive --include-path=node_modules
scripts.start:fake: npx env-cmd fake npm-run-all -p serve-fake-data start
scripts.build: npx env-cmd staging npm run build-raw
scripts.build:staging: npx env-cmd staging npm run build-raw
scripts.build:prod: npx env-cmd prod npm run build-raw
scripts.build-and-deploy:staging: npm-run-all build:staging remove-source-maps && firebase -P predictions-global-staging deploy
scripts.build-and-deploy:prod: npm-run-all build:prod remove-source-maps && firebase -P predictions-global-prod deploy
scripts.serve-fake-data: export DATA_FILE=$(npx ts-node -O '{"module": "commonjs"}' scripts/make-fake-data.ts) && cp scripts/serve.json $(dirname $DATA_FILE) && cd $(dirname $DATA_FILE) && npx serve -c serve.json -l 48773
scripts.upload-fake-data:staging: export DATA_FILE=$(npx ts-node -O '{"module": "commonjs"}' scripts/make-fake-data.ts) && gsutil -h "Content-Type:application/octet-stream" -h "Cache-Control:public, max-age=15" cp -a public-read $DATA_FILE gs://predictions-global-staging
